Layer.UpdateCommand:
%function(self) local config = stitch('config').HideProfilesGameplay local overlay = SCREENMAN:GetOverlayScreens() local screen for i=1,#overlay do screen = overlay[i] if screen:GetName() == 'ScreenSystemLayer' then if config then for pn=1,2 do screen('CreditsP'..pn):settext('') end end break end end
end
